content.en: Sensor optimization: Researchers are using algorithms to optimize the placement of sensors in transportation networks. These algorithms analyze various factors such as traffic demand, surveillance effectiveness, and information credibility to determine the best locations for the sensors. By strategically placing sensors, researchers aim to improve traffic monitoring, estimate demand more accurately, and enhance the overall efficiency of transportation systems.
content.da: Sensoroptimering: Forskere bruger algoritmer til at optimere placeringen af sensorer i transportnetværk. Disse algoritmer analyserer forskellige faktorer såsom trafikbelastning, overvågningseffektivitet og informationspålidelighed for at bestemme de bedste placeringer for sensorerne. Ved strategisk at placere sensorer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre trafikovervågningen, estimere efterspørgsel mere nøjagtigt og øge den samlede effektivitet af transportsystemer.
